title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Process and mechanical design of Mass Transfer Equipments: Binary distillation: process and equipment design of bubble-cap tray column.Gas Liquid Absorber (absorption without chemical reaction): process and equipment design of packed column.Cooling tower design, Crystalliser design, Design of driers.Text Book:Books suggested for Mass Transfer I
